question: Question_01_(d)
statement:
Write the negation of the statement

$\forall ~x \in \mathbb{R}, \exists ~y \in \mathbb{N} {\rm~s.t.~} x^{2} + y < x + y^{2}$.
sols:
The negation of the statement is given by

\begin{align*}\exists x \in \mathbb{R}\ \textrm{s.t.}\ \forall y \in \mathbb{N}\ x^2 +y \geq x + y^2.\end{align*}
hints:
Remember that the negation of the statement ``For all $x$, $P(x)$ is
true.'' is ``There exist an $x$ such that $P(x)$ is false''.
